Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Kist \Kist\ (k[i^]st), n. [See {Chest}.] A chest; hence, a coffin. [Scot. & Prov. End.] --Jamieson. --Halliwell. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Kist \Kist\, n. [Ar. gist.] A stated payment, especially a payment of rent for land; hence, the time for such payment. [India] [1913 Webster]
